title: Drawing, Decorative Project for Ceiling: Tondo with Triumph of Cerus
title_raw: Decorative Project for Ceiling: Tondo with Triumph of Cerus
medium: Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper
inscribed: Inscribed: ratto proserpina; cerere cerca proserpina; Cerere e Giove; Bacco e cerere; primavera; ripetuto due volte; estate (repeated twice); autonno (repeated twice); inverno (repeated twice)
creditline: Museum purchase through gift of various donors
description: Angles in four octagons showing the history of Proserpina and Ceres; Eight folders with cupids recounting the symbols of the Seasons

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, Decorative Project for Ceiling: Tondo with Triumph of Cerus. Pen and brown ink over traces of graphite on cream laid paper. 
Museum purchase through gift of various donors. 1901-39-3227
